   "cell_type": "markdown",

   "source": [
    "## Imports"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": null,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "# print 10 random numbers between 1 and 100\n",
    "import random\n",
    "for i in range(10):\n",
    "    print(random.randint(1, 100))"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": null,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "# print current directory\n",
    "import os\n",
    "print(os.getcwd())"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": null,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "import plotly.graph_objs as go\n",
    "import numpy as np\n",
    "\n",
    "# Create data\n",
    "x = np.linspace(0, 10, 100)\n",
    "y = np.sin(x)\n",
    "\n",
    "# Create plot\n",
    "fig = go.Figure()\n",
    "fig.add_trace(go.Scatter(x=x, y=y, mode='lines', name='sin(x)'))\n",
    "fig.update_layout(title='Interactive Plotly Sine Wave', xaxis_title='x', yaxis_title='sin(x)')\n",
    "\n",
    "# Show plot\n",
    "fig.show()"
   ]
  }
 ],
